name: Central Publications Bureau
description:
- Made for the 2022 Brackeys Game Jam - 

Not much to say in the way of controls or practical knowledge, the game is easy to learn and a quick bite-sized dystopian drama. 

I took the theme to mean making things not real when they very much are. I went down the route of propaganda and a 1984-style government where the player decides what to censor or not. Given some more work, I think this idea could work very well for a fully produced game. 

Hope you enjoy!
